instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-4924 original charger problem
threads.message:
This arrived with no liquid damage and no power. After replacing U7100, the board  turns on and works but only with fake charger.

Original charger goes out after a few seconds. Replaced Q7180,Q7010 and D7010 with no change. Surrounding resistors around U7100 measure good.

What should be checked next?

threads.title: 820-4924 original charger problem
threads.message:
Check R7012.
Post U7100 basic voltages (original charger).

Did you ty another DCIN board?
